T02TD2300E:228b-1: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
T02TD2300E:228b-2: gzugs med gzugs dang ldan pa'ang med //
T02TD2300E:228b-4: na yi yi ges brjod pa'o //
T02TD2300E:228b-6: gti mug rtag tu 'jig par byed //
T02TD2300E:228b-7: thar pa gcig bu legs par ster //
T02TD2300E:228b-8: bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms par byed //
T02TD2300E:228b-9: yi ge ma yis brjod pa'o //
T02TD2300E:228b-11: sangs rgyas kyis ni pha rol gshegs //
T02TD2300E:228b-12: sangs rgyas 'gro ba phan pa med //
T02TD2300E:228b-13: sangs rgyas nyon mongs dag pa ni //
T02TD2300E:228b-14: yi ge bud kyis brjod pa'o //
T02TD2300E:228b-16: chos rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yis//
T02TD2300E:228b-17: chos kyi dbyings dang bcas par ni //
T02TD2300E:228b-18: chos rnams nyid ni chos kyi mchog / yi ge dh'a yis brjod pa'o //
T02TD2300E:228b-20: ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin 'jig / ji ltar 'jig pa de bzhin gnas //
T02TD2300E:228b-21: ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed //
T02TD2300E:228b-22: yi ge ya yis brjod pa'o //
T02TD2300E:228b-23: na mo buddh'a ya'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
